definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to rush like ducks (idiom); the mob scrabbles madly for sth unobtainable/an unruly crowd on a wild goose chase
to blindly follow suit (idiom)/to imitate slavishly/to do what everyone else is doing
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
to fawn on/to kiss up to
see 亦步亦趨|亦步亦趋[yi4 bu4 yi4 qu1]

sentences.english: Bacterial chemotaxis optimization is a novel category of bionic algorithm for optimization problems.
sentences.chinese: 細菌趨藥性算法是優化領域一種新的仿生進化算法。

sentences.english: This would have been a very interesting story.
sentences.chinese: 這看似是一個非常有趨的發現。

sentences.english: Some cells also exhibit chemotaxis the ability to move toward or away from the source of a diffusing chemical.
sentences.chinese: 某些細胞具備趨藥性，即趨向或逃離擴散開的化學源。

sentences.english: Any action that takes us Godward is a good action.
sentences.chinese: 任何使我們趨近於神的行爲都是善行。

sentences.english: This is the first and only textbook and sourcebook on chemotaxis.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一個也是唯一的教科書和趨原始資料。

sentences.english: Billionaires swarmed into Nice to splurge millions during the summer holidays.
sentences.chinese: 暑期休假時，億萬富翁們羣趨尼斯揮霍了百萬鉅款。

sentences.english: Group buying is an outgrowth of a popular trend here– discount shopping.
sentences.chinese: 團購是非常流行趨的打折商店的副產品。

sentences.english: Then one of the judges of the city stood forth and said, "Speak to us of Crime and Punishment."
sentences.chinese: 城中的一位法官趨前言道，請給我們講講罪與罰。

sentences.english: It's concluded that O. hupensis has different phototaxis with different light intensities and colors.
sentences.chinese: 結論釘螺對光強和光色具有不同的趨性反應。

sentences.english: No obvious resistance against EBT and acetophenate has been found with sensitive level.
sentences.chinese: EBT和三氯殺蟲酯抗性不明顯，趨敏感水平。

sentences.english: Teachers' love can satisfy the students' psychology of being loved and soften their strong character.
sentences.chinese: 師愛能滿足學生趨愛心理，能以柔克剛。

definition: to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
